actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide for the elimination of the Department of Housing and Urban Development, and for other purposes.
short_title: Department of Housing and Urban Development Elimination Act of 1995
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate
Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
Department of Housing and Urban Development

summary.text: TABLE OF CONTENTS: Title I: Elimination of Department of Housing and Urban Development Title II: Transfer of Functions and Savings Provisions Department of Housing and Urban Development Elimination Act of 1995 - Title I: Elimination of Department of Housing and Urban Development - Eliminates the Department of Housing and Urban Development. Title II: Transfer of Functions and Savings Provisions - Transfers all functions of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development relating to the Fair Housing Act to the Department of Justice.

titles.title: Department of Housing and Urban Development Elimination Act of 1995
A bill to provide for the elimination of the Department of Housing and Urban Development, and for other purposes.
